statement.name: findRandomTracks
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 :maxCount RAND() AS rnd, {trackColumns} FROM track t WHERE :sourcePlaylistId IS NULL OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM link_track_playlist ltp WHERE ltp.track_id = t.id AND ltp.playlist_id = :sourcePlaylistId) ORDER BY rnd

statement.name: findAlbumImage
statement.sql: SELECT LIMIT 0 1 data AS data FROM image i, track t WHERE t.album = :album AND i.track_id = t.id AND i.size = :size

statement.name: nextPlaylistId
statement.sql: SELECT TOP 1 NEXT VALUE FOR playlist_id_sequence AS id FROM system_information
